body:
When running `npm install`, I get

```
npm WARN babel-loader@6.2.4 requires a peer of babel-core@^6.0.0 but none was installed.
npm WARN babel-loader@6.2.4 requires a peer of webpack@1 || ^2.1.0-beta but none was installed.
```
body_text:
